data.title: Interview with Charles-Ferdinand Nothomb (Sanem, 2 June 2010) — Excerpt: Wilfried Martens and Mark Eyskens, Belgian Prime Ministers
meta_keywords: 2 june 2010) — excerpt: wilfried martens and mark eyskens
data.meta_description: In this interview excerpt, Charles-Ferdinand Nothomb, Belgian Foreign Minister from 1980 to 1981, describes the different styles of the two Prime Ministers under whom he served during his time in office: Wilfried Martens and Mark Eyskens.
